website_summaries.verdict: If you want a traditional metal pedal car this is your best bet, it comes in several shapes including a hot rod and a fire truck.
pros: Traditional pedal car for small children
InStep also makes a firetruck, pink car, police car, and taxi
cons: These cars are beautiful and durable, but you really need to get them for very young children, or a family just starting

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific gift for a youngster
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific gift for a youngster, he will be thrilled! I bought it for my grandson and it is exactly like one that I got for my son 47 years ago, except that in 1971 I bought it fully assembled. The fact that you have to put this together yourself is the only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5. But once it's together, it is very sturdy and well made. The pedals can be adjusted as the child grows. My husband said it was a pain in the neck to put together, but he is 80 and a little grumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Seaside

customer_reviews.title: I was very excited to get this car for my little girl and when she opened it up on Christmas morning her eyes lit up with joy. U
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was very excited to get this car for my little girl and when she opened it up on Christmas morning her eyes lit up with joy. Unfortunately, we had the car for 3 weeks before it broke. Not only did it break, but it broke in a place that we cant fix it and where it should have been strong. I am sad to say I wont be purchasing another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne welden

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, healthy exercise, can't wear it out
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago for our 3-year-old grandson. He loved it then and still does. He and his older brother both have pedal cars - they both use them regularly. Note that the horn and trunk were added. Note also that Dad is having as much fun as Grandson. Update 05/06/15: Both boys still love their pedal cars. The younger boy, now 5 yo, still uses his pedal car frequently. I noted that the older boy is getting a bit big for his car (a different model). He said, "Yes, but I'm NOT giving it up!"
customer_reviews.author: PTinNC

customer_reviews.title: we had fun..
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 3 year old grandson... other grandparent reviews encouraged us to do so... they were right!... we took our time and assembled it together... both of us... it took two hours, taking our time, on the deck.. and, we had fun... because we didn't wait until the last minute... our grandson loved it... just like the one his father had, when he was 3 years old, 35 years ago... one suggestion: we made a conscious decision to insert the four (4) screws, for the rear axle assembly, from the top side of the seat... instead of from the undercarraige, as stated in instructions...
customer_reviews.author: John Webster Frost

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Another grandmother here. I read the directions first and assembled it in 45 minutes. Directions say to not over tighten some parts. Take this seriously as those parts are the ones that make it easy to pedal or not. This was a big hit for my 3 year old granddaughter and all of her friends. Each little one at her birthday party wanted a turn. Now she rides it often. I took the ladders off when all the children were over as they come off easily and I did not want anyone hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great company! Saved Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This company is so wonderful. We ordered this truck for our almost 3 year old. All he wanted for Christmas was a fire truck. When we started putting it together two days before Christmas one of the wheels had a broken piece of rubber. I called the company and pleaded with them to send a new wheel. They initially said the wheel wouldn't make it on time but then the wheel arrived on Christmas Eve!!! Our son was so happy. He loves it. It's a really beautiful truck.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Grandpa & Grandy wanted Legend to have a wonderful Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandpa & Grandy wanted Legend to have a wonderful Christmas gift. Because he lives so far away, we had to have it shipped to him in Atlanta. It did arrive with the box crushed and front end damage and although Amazon was willing to make it right, my grandson had already seen it and would not see it leave the house. So, Amazon and I settled on a discounted amount for the gift and everyone is happy. I would still buy another model for my little Legend's birthday in July. Still looking at all options. They are very sturdy and will last a lifetime and are great for handing down to future generations. That's my plan. (huge smiles)
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with my grandson!
customer_reviews.text: This car wasn't hard to put together, just time consuming. It looks great and my grandson loves it. My only complaint is the ladders will not stay on and there's nothing to secure them. We just took them off for him to play in the car. Also, the bell gets stuck and won't ring consecutively. We were able to work with it some but it's a design flaw. Everything else is great for the money! I posted an image of our not quite 2 year old grandson in his car. As soon as he opened his other presents he began loading them up in the back of the car. Too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Curlyfry

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 and half year old grandson. I thought it was great! He will grow into it as the peddles seem out of place to him. Can't get him to understand that he will love it more when he can make it go with the peddles. Well made for what it is. My daughter was so happy it was not plastic. It will last. Looks cool. Easy to put together. Glad we got it. But, it is a little advanced for 2.5 years. But, the add informed us of that before we bought it so no disappointment there. He will grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Drugdoc

customer_reviews.title: 5 Year Old Son Wanted Red Thunderbird, Painted it and he's none the wiser.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son wanted a Thunderbird for Christmas because grandpa bought one a bit ago. There is nothing like that online for a reasonable price. So I purchased this and spray painted the pink parts red X-mas night and he absolutely loves it. Took him a little bit to get the leg power to push the car around with the pedals, but now he's crashing into walls and damaging the heck out of my house while that car still looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lecakes

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but order early and assemble to make sure everything is in order.
customer_reviews.text: Though it's cute as a button, the box was not presentable as a present. Once opened there was a small dent in the hood of the fire truck. I received a small credit for the damage, didn't make me happy,but I didn't want to return it because it was close to Christmas . My husband, a mechanic, said it was a pain in the butt to assemble. Also, to boot, it is missing hardware. So tomorrow we have to go to Lowe's to purchase the nuts, bolts and screws that were missing before we can present it on Christmas day to our grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Roadster!
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly easy to put together, as it entails groveling on the floor some. But after SEVERAL HOURS of tweaking, including having to remove and re-install two wheels, it looks FANTASTIC. Shortening the pedal length was easy. I jumped the gun, though. My 18-month-old grandson hasn't yet mastered the art of pedaling even though he's finally getting the hang of steering. But he loves pushing it around inside the house and on the patio. He especially loves the custom name license plate I velcroed to the back!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: takes time to assemble but ITS WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Its HEAVY and WELL MADE!!! YOU WILL LOVE IT! It takes time to assemble but the instructions are good. Our son LOVES IT. We've had it a few months now (it was a 4th birthday present from my husband and I) and he still really enjoys it. The peddles in it were easy for him to catch on too. Such a nice toy!
customer_reviews.author: Lia Namirr

customer_reviews.title: best Christmas EVER, because of this car!
customer_reviews.text: I'll try to stay on course, and not gush too much. A well made product, that my Grandson loves. The instructions are not the best, and youtube videos didn't help much either so expect some rough-patches during assembly. It is mentioned that it is best for "3 and up", my little man is 16 months in the photo, I do not expect him to fit in it when he is 3. LOVES to be pushed around in it tho. (I left the pedals off, so they would not hit him) great stuff if you love old-school COOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Rock Fan

customer_reviews.title: NOT painted, like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this purchase. I purchased other instep vehicles, which were great, however this one, advertised as painted, already had decals (not paint) decals, coming off upon arrival. All purple trim around flames are decals and poor quality ones at that. I contacted manufacturer directly (as package contents state to) to ask for replacement decals or paint so this could be touched up and got radio silence. VERY unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: terrable paint job
customer_reviews.text: The instructions and 100% of the many parts were included. The paint look it had some type of lacquer that had been unevenly applied then while still wet an then an attempt to correct the mistake by wiping the excess which made it worse. looks like scotch tape that was stuck together then pulled apart leaving blotchy mastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible purchase!!!!! This car may have lasted a few weeks and then a very important part snapped. My 3 year old only got to enjoy it for a short time. Now it's useless. I tried to buy a replacement part on "pedalcar.com" ... But it turns out that their parts are not the same as Instep car parts. The sizes are different! DONT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: TayTay

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item. My grandson loves it and easy for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. My grandson loves it and easy for him to operate. Cinch to put together out of the box. Substantial metal body, it works well , seems pretty safe to me. As with any item like this, I just have to watch him, as a normal precaution, so he doesn't get going too fast down hill.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Not durable and No replacement parts available
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our granddaughter for Christmas. She has had for less than a year. The pedal strap bearing that connects to the rear axle broke. We have reached out to this company for a replacement part and have been told that they don't have replacement parts. For what we paid for this car it should be more durable and or the company should at least offer replacement parts when needed. I have attached a photo of the parts diagram. The part we need for replacement is part.#7 This is very disappointing and frustrating. Please be aware that if you purchase this car you will be unable to get parts for it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: MamaZing

customer_reviews.title: Fire Engine Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Bought for our grandson & wish we had one our size! This is a quality item. Follow the directions & it is very easy to out together. While this will be used outside, we will plan on keeping it inside as it is 100 percent metal like the old pedal cars.
customer_reviews.author: Waking Up

customer_reviews.title: KIDS LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I thought this pedal fire truck made more sense than a battery operated car or truck that after the battery dies winds up covered in dust and never used again. I doubt the style of this has changed in over 30 years. Lots of parts and pieces, but in the end a very happy child.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: They don't know fun toys these days
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little petal car I've seen since I was little. I got this for my grandchildren. They don't know fun toys these days. They had never seen one. Kids just don't know about fun manual toys. It's a toy you ride outside. To bad parents don't do more outside games with children no more. All my grandchildren all want to play now with it when they come here. No video games or phones. They like it outside now. Try it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenkis

customer_reviews.title: The product is almost like the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: The product is almost like the picture shows, some small differences to the product vs the picture. However, there were a few cosmetic issues with the product. I found a red scuff mark that appeared to be paint, thankfully it buffed mostly out. Same with the little windshield which appeared to be rusted but wasn't. There's some small flaws in the metal (little dings and creases) and trash in the paint, but that's to be expected. The instructions did not include how to apply the hubcaps to the wheel so figuring out how to place them ended up a little challenging. Over all the product seems to be really good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LPTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED THIS AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR OUR GRANDDAUGHTERS. WHEN I WAS A CHILD MY PARENTS PURCHASED A GREEN PEDAL CAR FOR ME AND I WANTED MY GRANDDAUTHERS TO HAVE ONE ALSO. MY HUSBAND PUT IT TOGETHER ON CHRISTMAS EVE WITH VERY LITTLE DIFFICULTY. WHEN IT WAS FINISHED IT LOOKED GREAT! THE CHOICE OF DECALS THAT YOU CAN PUT ON WERE A VERY GOOD SELECTION, WE WENT WITH THE POODLES, RECORDS AND MUSIC NOTES, OH YES, AND THE LITTLE DICE DECALS LOOK GREAT ON THE WINDSHIELD! OUR GRANDDAUGHTERS LOVED IT. I WOULD PURCHASE THIS CAR AGAIN IT WAS WORTH THE MONEY WE SPENT AND IT IS REALLY CUTE! I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PURCHASE FOR ANYONE LOOKING FOR A PEDAL CAR!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Z.

customer_reviews.title: SO COOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This police car was my grandson's favorite birthday gift!!! It is very well made and a very good looking product. My other grandson wants the fire truck and has given us several hints to that fact!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Woodruff Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy car. Adjust pedals to your child’s height. My grandson loves playing policeman and writing tickets. Would recommend over electric cars. They get exercise peddling rather than just steering.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Awsome little car
customer_reviews.text: Beyond worth it! Fairly good construction. A few of the metal pieces had sharp areas at crease points(particularly on the steering wheel) but it was easily fixed with a little sandpaper. I bought this to re-paint and turn into a mini version of the family’s 1053 Buick, the body style was almost identical, so it worked perfectly! My two yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley linder

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of noise when pushing the petals as if something is rubbing. May need some adjustment, but don't know where. My 4 year old grandson rides it continually. Nice paint job on it. Easier to put together if you have 2 people -- otherwise a bit of a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dachton

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This toy has a lot of great qualities and features especially for the price. The attention to detail, rugged construction makes you think you have a vintage pedal car. However, assembly is a chore, things like no ladder clips are oversights. Children may be tempted to climb the removable ladders that dont seem engineered for that purpose. Also pedal operation requires quite a bit of strength. By Joshua Garfinkle NHCRS
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Garfinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sidewalk hot rod
customer_reviews.text: 4-year old grandson loves it, although he's still just a bit small to propel it up a slight incline (that's where grandpa comes in). Sturdy, great quality, although the pinstriping has a tendency to peel off in places. If you've built IKEA furniture, you can assemble this.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Way Cool
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. I was surprised when it came to find that the flames are actually painted on! I was expecting them to be a sticker. I had a friend of mine that does pin striping add my grandson's name on the sides for a nice personal touch. Way Cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Z

customer_reviews.title: Rubber on tires has order.
customer_reviews.text: The car is great. No instructions to put it together but is fairly simple. Big complaint the rubber tires had a very strong order and I have not brought it into the house. I keep it in garage for my grandson to play with. Took 4 months for the smell to almost go away.
customer_reviews.author: KIRK HANSEN

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero I would! We got this for our son for Christmas. It showed up in a box that was beat to hell & tapes 3+ times over. It had NO instructions & missing bolts & washers to put it together! If this wasn’t for Christmas I’d sent it back! Biggest piece of junk I’ve ever seen & the fact they charge $200 for it is even worse! DO NOT BUY THIS ITS A JOKE!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before Christmas and due to weather just got around to putting it together in March. Looked great until i noticed the rubber had split off one of the wheels, tried calling the company and got lost in phone hell.......these are made in China and imported by "Instep" and obviously not prechecked before sending out. I ordered a replacement tire through another company and hope to have my Granddaughter driving soon.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this fire engine
customer_reviews.text: The quality of everything is excellent. Assembly was several hours. Two of the parts bags have the same letter, and I chose the wrong one causing some disassembly prior to proceeding. Overall, the quality is truly excellent like it was in the 1950’s! Heavy, strong for 3 years and older. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: GR8 PRESENT
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how quickly this large product was delivered to my home. The InStep fire Truck Pedal Car is a Christmas Present for my two year old grandkids. I had my brother put this together as it came with lots of bolts and screws. Took him about 45 minutes (and he is excellent with tools). I just love this as they will get exercise along with playing instead of the motorized cars they just sit in. LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Northern CA

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Poor instructions - front end was a little difficult to get together, but was able to get it working. I am using this for display in my garage and not sure how easy it would be for a child to use. Very stiff but it looks real good on the shelf above my closets.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: Not a functional pedal car
customer_reviews.text: I am giving one star because it is cute. The pedal design is non-functional. I spent about $250 fir two of these pedal cars and neither child can move it one inch 😡 All it did was cause frustration for them. It’s impossible to take apart and return. What does the seller suggest????
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Not a functional pedal car!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving one star because it is cute. The pedal design is non-functional. I spent about $250 fir two of these pedal cars and neither child can move it one inch 😡 All it did was cause frustration for them. It’s impossible to take apart and return. What does the seller suggest????
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together instructions are horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy but the instructions to put it together suck. I’m good with tools and putting things together and it still took me about 2 hours. Once you figure a few parts out it’s not too hard to finish because you just do the same thing on the other side, but trying to figure those first few steps out takes a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great looking peddle car!
customer_reviews.text: This little car is very sturdy snd once put together is going to last a long time. This is for our grandson's birthday. He loves all sorts of cars and trucks so this will be a great surprise for him!
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Mc Clung

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pedal car ordered through Amazon & will order more!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love to send these to the next generation. So easy to know they will get there as advertised. Was easy for experienced & rookie assembliers. Will need another fire engine and probably pink caddie for future kids who are now infants. 3 or 4 years is definitely the age for this product. My brothers who hit 60yrs had these types of pedal cars when that age, so the quality is still fabulous. FYA---the color red fades the worst of all others-so what would you expect!!! It's worth getting repainted and detailed later. Very very pleased and have recommended this especially for gifts that have to be shipped out.
customer_reviews.author: meezers in VA

customer_reviews.title: Shame on you!
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving my pedal car for my three year old grandson, I was more excited than he. Unfortunately I was sadly disappointed when I was putting it together and notice that one of the wheels were damaged beyond repair . I was forced to rate this pedal car a ONE star because it was unusable!!! All the money we spent and there was no way it could be given on Christmas Day! Shame on you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very cool car for pre schooler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 1 1/2 year old grandson and he could reach the pedals on the first pedal adjustment hole. He also enjoys pushing this very well built car around by holding onto the back, although I have to help him steer it. Now that he is 2, I can see him growing into it and getting some great exercise as well! My neighbors also love this retro look and so he gets lots of socialization when they stop to comment and talk to him. overall, a very well built product! Note: My friend had little trouble putting it together and he's mechanical.
customer_reviews.author: MAJ214

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product came in fine. I freaked out 2 days before Christmas cause I thought it was missing a wheel. I was fuming mad and imagined a 3 wheel pedal car under the tree. Turns out the fourth wheel is in another box inside. Crisis averted. For 150 I thought the price was right for what you get since it turned out having all 4 wheels. It glides Smoothly and everything assembled just fine. Thanks for making my sons Christmas a great one.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: A really cute gift!
customer_reviews.text: Our boy is pretty tall, so I’m not sure if he’s Going to be able to ride or once he learns how to! But it’s beautiful none the less!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Deserves a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.text: This car is a great buy. The reviews that describe wheels falling of or bolts coming through the seat are because of the car being assembled wrong. Because the nuts are nylon lock nuts they should not be tightened against the wheels. The instructions use the words hand tighten during initial assembly. But they should be tightened enough to engage the nylon with a wrench. This is a well built tow with all the needed hardware.
customer_reviews.author: B. Agner

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: remade antique toy, looks and functions like the original antique. Very sturdy for children, especially easy to peddle for small children.... excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Aherbel

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for my future fire fighters
customer_reviews.text: My boys (currently 6 and 3) have been using this fire truck for almost two and a half years and it is still going strong. The ladders did not make it out of the box in one piece, and the coating/paint on the bell started flaking off right away, but that has not stopped this InStep Fire Truck Pedal Car from being one of my boys favorite toys. The body of the truck has held up well the peddles remain fully functional. it is a favorite toy and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: 2 boysMama

customer_reviews.title: Scratch on the paint, corroded windshield and flame stickets out of the place
customer_reviews.text: Car is beautiful. Had the same model a few years ago (original version). Came in a box with a scracth and a minor bump. Flames details are on vynil stickets what are wrongly placed and one over the other. It would be bettter to have this added by end user or be careful to place correctly. Few days after buying price droped substantially. No customer care response.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cool Hot Rod
customer_reviews.text: Cool little hot rod for my grandson. I bought it the day he was born. He's 3 1/2 now and almost big enough to use it. He hasn't learned how to steer yet and it's quite heavy to pedal. I had something similar when I was about 5 years old and loved it. For now he sits in it to watch TV. It's all metal and the quality is equal or better to what was produced 5-6 decades ago.
customer_reviews.author: Koda2000

customer_reviews.title: that smile... worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a "bad ass" truck. I love it. The fact that is pedal I just love it. No stress over charging a battery. Very vintage looking plus he get exercise while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Dalmita

customer_reviews.title: Well made if replacement parts are available
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Seemed good quality other than bearing on rear drive axle is not spot welded true to shafts which makes it bind when trying to pedal. Will contact supplier after holiday for replacement. If this goes well it will make a good purchase. If not it maybe difficult to fix.
customer_reviews.author: j.hendrson

customer_reviews.title: Nice pedal car
customer_reviews.text: Nicely looking sturdy car that will last many years. My toddler loves it. Paired it with a police officer costume for Halloween pictures. The only negative is the time it takes to assemble. It took over an hour in my case to put all the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Kids Lov It
customer_reviews.text: Fun, & really nice sturdy sit-in pedal toy vehicle. Requires a little patience assembling, but worth it. Tires are thinner than I had hoped, but other than that, it's totally adorable.
customer_reviews.author: c0l0rad0red

customer_reviews.title: Medium to low quality
customer_reviews.text: I felt it important to share that the construction is not very precise and that if you buy this thing you'll have to forgive some serious lack of precision. Many of the parts just barely came together, and had to be wiggled in to place . Maybe this is true to the original metal toy car specs, but it feels all around flimsy and unsubstantial considering it's weight an metal construction. I might be spoiled by the relatively high quality fit and finish of even the most cheaply made modern toys.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy Fire truck
customer_reviews.text: This pedal car is fantastic. My 3 yr old loves it. It took him about a day to figure out the pedals but now he's a pro. Assembly was time consuming but easy. Very sturdy and something we will have for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn T

customer_reviews.title: Cute for Pictures, Impractical for Use
customer_reviews.text: Not that safe for young kids. We bout huh this for my son’s 2nd birthday. He really can’t use it. The metal has pointed areas, so it’s easy for him to hurt himself when he tries to ride in this. Plus the petals are just metal bars, no foot petal. Would not recommend for a young child...
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Ann

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, hard to maneuver, and too ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble, hard to maneuver, and too expensive for what it is. It just sits in the corner of our house as a decoration piece now...
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Tough little car
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this car for my Grandson as a help to Santa this year. Assembled it in about an hour start to finish. There was one missing nut from one of the petals so count all your parts. That is a very short lock nut that keeps the petal locked on, so you can't just run out and get another one. Turning radius could be improved and if you loose a hub cap there are some sharp edges on the wheels that you will need to address. But this is a very cool grandparent gift when Santa needs some help.
customer_reviews.author: 76Tiger

customer_reviews.title: CHILD POWER...not battery power!
customer_reviews.text: This car is sooo cute and my 4 year old granddaughter loves it! She wanted a battery operated car...this is so much better - she gets great exercise! It's been very cold this winter, so she's had to drive around and around in our basement. She has become very aware of her surroundings, she's learned to turn the wheels and back up and she drives around with her blonde curls blowing behind her singing, "I'm going fast, I'm going fast!"
customer_reviews.author: LRH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my car loving nephew!
customer_reviews.text: This pedal car is adorable and made to last a long time. When putting this together we noticed the two front wheels wouldn't turn. We had to bend the frame that holds the petals and front wheels quite a bit to get it to work properly. Once it was all put together, it works well. I wish they would have made all gray and chrome parts either gray or chrome. It looks funny that some parts are chrome and others are gray.We are also making cushions for the bottom and back of the seat so its more comfortable.Overall, I think its adorable and my nephew is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, but my three year old doesn't like to pedal it. He'd rather push it and he can't steer while he's pushing, so he doesn't like it. I'm hoping he'll decide pedaling isn't all bad and gets some enjoyment out of it. Can't fault the product for the kid's preference.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I are not terribly gifted with putting toys together but in this case ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are not terribly gifted with putting toys together but in this case the directions couldn't have been better. Our grandson loves this fire truck. He'll be able to use this for many years as you can adjust the pedals as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Doo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephews birthday and had some decals put on the side with his name on it. had a few minor little paint details that were a little scratched but rather than that i was super happy with my order
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Classic!!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of work to assemble but this is a classic that will last forever! Worth the work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: The car arrived with dents, chipped pin striping and scuffs on the hood. For the price, you would think the paint job would be flawless. Pretty disappointing but it’s needed for a birthday in 2 days. Don’t waste your time on this
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very heavy! Will last for ages. Hard to put together and the instructions would be a lot better/helpful if the pictures were colored and not b&w. Tires are really smelly to keeping car indoors and nearly impossible due to the strong smell (headache). Instructions do warn about leaving car outside because of discoloration. Keeping it in garage until the tires stop smelling. Ladders do come off fyi. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat Rod!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for our 'soon to be 3' grandson. I was worried about the assembly. I shouldn't have been. The directions came written and with pictures that were very easy to follow. It took the two of us a little over an hour. One person could have put it together, but two worked better for us. It is a sturdy (and very cool) little peddle car. It has 3 size adjustments peddles for child's growth. With no rough edges, it is very well made. I love the peddle action...not rotary. It was very easy for our grandson to master. This very much reminded me of the peddle car my sister and I had growing up.:)
customer_reviews.author: Rescued

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My Wife and I purchased this for or neighbors little girl it's perfect and will out last and plastic electric car ever made. We an she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: An overwhelming project
customer_reviews.text: This truck may turn out to be fabulous, but as of this moment, my son and daughter in law are sitting with a zillion pieces that need to be put together...... and undoubtedly cursing me out for sending it to my grandson. ( the entire truck needs to be assembled)
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. It's very durable and well made and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It's very durable and well made and it looks like it's from the 50's. Have you looked at prices of old peddle cars? Omg, they're through the roof. Even bad ones, rusty, broken, bent, damaged, are bringing near a thousand dollars. This is definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: This car is absolutely adorable. That being said it is quite difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: This car is absolutely adorable. That being said it is quite difficult to pedal...it's not impossible, but even when they get it going it's not fast enough to be fun. Our daughters are ages three and five, but neither one of them care to use this car. I love the idea of the kids powering their own car, but in hind sight I should have paid twice as much and bought an electric one. All this car does is sit in our driveway looking pretty. ;)
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, sturdy and all around fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pedal cars! I purchased the fire truck and the police car for my child's toy room. They were larger than I expected and fairly easy to assemble! I didn't intend for my son to use these but they are irresistible! He loves driving the fire truck and ringing the bell!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wang

customer_reviews.title: Hard parts came assembled. 2 year old likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 2 year old girl for her birthday. She loves it. It is a little hard to pedal, but she just turned two, just give it time. It seems well made. Took a little while to put together, but luckily the really hard parts came already assembled.
customer_reviews.author: M Howard

customer_reviews.title: A classic pedal car, like we had back when.
customer_reviews.text: A great classic pedal fire truck. A little bit of a challeange to assemble after midnight on Christmas eve. Assembly went well but needed to be done atop a table.
customer_reviews.author: VAQ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little fire truck!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality especially for the price! Bell and ladders are a very nice addition, makes for a very appealing fire truck! Nice paint job, great decals! Such a nice little truck, could end up a family heirloom!
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Fire Truck Pedal Car
customer_reviews.text: The InStep Fire Truck Pedal Car is a very nice Pedal Car and was easy to assemble but the screw package was torn and lots of nuts and bolts throughout the box. My daughter had a Fire Engine Pedal Car when she grew up so it was only natural for my grand daughter to get one. At age of 2yrs and 2 months she has already mastered getting in and I have taught her to actually use her little feet and legs to make it go. This is her second Pedal Car and she is well along to start her collection.
customer_reviews.author: Gert U. Gehlhaar

customer_reviews.title: Grand-Daughter loves this fire Truck
customer_reviews.text: Good Value, Fast service. A real bargain.!!! The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis F. Bell

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This car was the hit of Christmas morning! My 3 year old grand daughter loves it!! item shipped quickly and all parts were present and in fine working order...we purchased white vinyl decals from some other dealers on Amazon and turned this little beauty into a girlie 49ers car....grandma and daddy love the 49ers! My grand daughter is 38 inches tall and after adjusting the pedals for her...she still has room to grow as we are not on the last adjustment. Some of the decals that come with the car are cute..but be aware that you can put whatever decals you want on the car as the decals are not prestuck to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda O.

customer_reviews.title: Great pedal car
customer_reviews.text: This is really cool pedal car for a kid. We bought it for our 3 year old, and he loves it. There is a pretty strong smell to it that eventually wears off, but certainly noticeable to us. The only reason I didn't give it five stars was because the ladders aren't very sturdy. I realize they aren't intended to be used functionally, however, they have come unglued from just taking them on and off the rack. It's an easy fix to put some wood or hot glue in there, but wish they were a bit more durable. Assembly overall was pretty smile, though it took almost an hour. It drives really well and the car itself is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Great price for a brand new pedal car!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Marno

customer_reviews.title: Great, classic pedal car for kiddos! Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great, classic, pedal car. Perfect for a little girl, of course. Our daughter loves it but at 3 yo, and about 34" tall she still finds it hard to reach pedals at closest setting. Well built, solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Better description of items
customer_reviews.text: Although this was an warehouse item it was badly damaged more than described! Really dented and paint was chipping off. So no way! I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Thomas

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks, rear left wheel broke off axle request axle replacement no responds
customer_reviews.author: Franco101

customer_reviews.title: One bad hot rod
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was easier to build but for the price, and moreover the happiness it brought my nephew it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: EuphoricBitch

customer_reviews.title: Good fire truck, but lots of assembly.
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys riding around in this fire truck. However, it is worth mentioning that building this thing takes patience as there are a million pieces. I also had to hammer those little metal hubcaps to make them fit the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Small Child's Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a good idea for my 3-1/2 yr. old granddaughter until my son and I tried to assemble it. I really don't know why it wasn't already assembled. The unit went together just fine until the drive wheel...the rear metal was bent in a fashion that created stress that caused the wheel lock nut to back off and we were afraid the wheel would come off....Finally my son was able to "bend" the metal into place that worked. The assembly instructions could be edited and made easier to follow. Other than running into walls it was a great ride!
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall toy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 year old. It is built sturdy, easy to put together, cost is cheap, and is just cool retro. Overall I am going 5 stars on this. IT IS A PEDAL CAR and performs exactly as one of this style has for 100 years. It is not a powerwheels that goes 10 miles per hour...it goes walking speed as it should. I am not the sharpest lightbulb in the toolbox, but this isn't rocker surgery either. This thing took 45 minutes max (if that) to put together. Good product thanks to Amazon.com and In-Step for having it available.
customer_reviews.author: Greg!

customer_reviews.title: Nice pedal car but some of the decals were peeling ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice pedal car but some of the decals were peeling off right out of the box. Tires have a horrible smell. Was purchased as a Christmas gift for our 21 month old Grandson. He hasn't learned to peddle it yet but he will. I wanted him to have a car he can get som exercise while riding. Is heavy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: A huge Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great detail and great for pretend! My husband and I promised ourselves upon ordering this, that it would just be for outside. That did not last long, as he wanted to be in it day and night! My son received this for his 4th birthday and fit in it fine, still does....now my tall six year old is a bit squished in it. The pedals are a bit stiff to actually move as a bike concept.....so my kids usually just use the floor and Flinstone it.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: broken pedal; did Instep go out of business?
customer_reviews.text: This truck looks so cool! When we got it the kids couldn't quite reach the pedals so it sat in the garage for a while. Finally they grew in to it and the shaft connected to the pedal just broke. The website for Instep is down now so how can this be this repaired or replaced?
customer_reviews.author: James N. Rodbard

customer_reviews.title: Very durable. Can be use at multiple child sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Has 3 adjustments for pedal reach so can grow with the child. Instructions were good. Easy to adjust petal reach. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Teeee

customer_reviews.title: fun but take precautions
customer_reviews.text: classic but more for us from the 60s than the 2010s have to take the ladders and ladder hooks off to prevent injuries to small ones. and how did we ever survive the small kinda sharp edges in the body work. I had a very similar green station wagon when I was a kid and survived without much damage but I can see these issues and have taken precautions as described above.
customer_reviews.author: Steveshadow

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the memories!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a toy bringing back memories! One of my first memories is pedaling a version of this around my driveway back in the ...well, a while ago! I ordered this to have at my house when grandkids come. It arrived quickly and was well packaged. The directions were clear and easy to follow. It took me about 45 minutes to assemble, and I was not in any rush doing it. The quality of the toy is very impressive. Parts fit well, wheels turn well, it is a heavy, sturdy toy. I can't wait to see my grandkids playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Priesing

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 year old Granddaughter. She loves it. I am so impressed with the quality of the product and the decals. This is a flash back to the retro cars we played with in the 1960's. I have to admit I was shocked by the quality. For the money, I was not expecting this car to be so well built. It was easy to put together. I highly recommend this car!
customer_reviews.author: sandyg

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and durability.
customer_reviews.text: Our grand boy loves this. It's well made and sturdy. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: This little car broke a month after I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This little car broke a month after I bought it. I now have to find someone who can weld it back together.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna

customer_reviews.title: Old School fire truck for my son
customer_reviews.text: This is very much like the one I had when I was three years old - more than 40 years ago! I put it together for my son on Christmas eve. He loves it as much as I did when I was his age! Its good solid construction, all metal and wood. The directions are very clear and easy to follow. It brings me joy to see him having fun playing with it, and it calls to mind fond memories of my own childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zacchea

customer_reviews.title: pedal or drivability
customer_reviews.text: This vehicle looks great and I do love the steel construction, but my 3 yr old granddaughter has a hard time pedaling. It is stiff and the steering is not easy as well. it gets stuck and does not seem to flow and pedal with ease to jump in and go...:(
customer_reviews.author: Milee Griego-Rotunno

product_meta.title: InStep Kids Toy Pedal Car, Toddler Push and Ride On Toy, Fire Truck
product_meta.description:
Color:Fire TruckFor kids of all ages from toy collectors to boys and girls who want to drive like mom and dad. Great nostalgic pedal cars to stimulate their wild imaginations and provide hours of fun.

AMAZON.COM
Combining a delightfully retro design that will please parents with easy-to-operate pedal action, this InStep Fire Truck pedal car will bring a smile to your child as he or she rambles through the neighborhood. Based on the design of the best-selling "Dip Side" pedal car from the 1950s, this InStep pedal car features solid steel construction for outstanding durability for years to come, and it's decorated with bright fire engine red lead-free paint. It's further complemented by shiny chrome steering wheel and ladder holders (with removable wooden ladders) and a bell attached to the hood with a fire helmet accent on top and string that attaches to the steering wheel. Other features include a small storage area behind the seat, rubber tires with chrome hub caps, and an adjustable pedal drive that fits a wide range of kids' sizes. Some assembly required. Appropriate for children ages 3 and up. 

 

 Specifications and Features:

 * For ages 3 and older 
 * Maximum weight limit: 70 pounds 
 * Assembled dimensions: 37 x 12 x 17 inches 
 * Weight: 40 pounds 
 * Solid steel construction 
 * Authentic detailing 
 * Adjustable pedal drive 
 * Lead-free paint 
 * Functional steering 
 * Rubber tires and chrome hub caps
feature_bullets: Stylish, nostalgic fire truck pedal car for children ages 3 and up
Solid steel frame with authentic detailing brings back old memories
Adjustable pedal drive fits a wide range of children; lead free paint
Rubber tires and chrome hub caps feel smooth and look great
Easy to control steering wheel; 70 pound weight limit; some assembly required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,004 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
